name: Konzentra
description:
Konzentra is different. We’ve all heard the studies saying that games improve brain functions and such, but very few games actually try to do that, and the ones which do often forget the fun part entirely. We decided to make a game which is both fun, and helpful. We don’t focus on any concrete subject, but instead, we work on something all of us can use: concentration.

This game was developed by 6 teenagers in conjunction with Uwezo Learning (http://uwezolearning.com/).

The game features 5 unique, randomized levels, challenging gameplay, powerups and custom models, music, and textures. 

We hope you all enjoy it :)

Avinash Boddu: Leader of the group and Primary Developer

Mansi Gupta: Modelling

Aakash Gupta: Mechanics

Gnyana Balemarthy: Music

Aditya Reddy: Texturing

Eshaan Reddy: Marketing
